entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
